sailpoint.object

Interface Describable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Application, Bundle, CandidateRole, Classification, ManagedAttribute, Policy

    public interface Describable
    Interface for objects that have descriptions. As of the time this interface originated these are: Application, Policy, Bundle, ManagedAttribute

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Incrementally add one description.
